alert.note: Alert for Carter; Shannon (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 05 at 4:53PM CDT until May 08 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Missouri... Jacks Fork at Alley Spring affecting Shannon County. James River at Galena affecting Stone County. James River near Boaz affecting Stone and Christian Counties. Current River near Powder Mill affecting Carter and Shannon Counties. .Heavy rainfall received overnight has caused river levels to rise above flood stage. For the Jacks Fork River Basin...including Alley Spring...Minor flooding is forecast. For the James River Basin...including Boaz, Galena...Minor flooding is forecast. For the Current River...including Powder Mill...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Current River near Powder Mill. * WHEN...Until Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...At 8.0 feet, County Road 106-531 south of the gage floods near the river. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 3:45 PM CDT Thursday the stage was 6.9 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise above flood stage late this evening to 10.5 feet tomorrow morning. It will then fall to 9.8 feet and begin rising again tomorrow morning. It will rise to 10.0 feet early tomorrow afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 8.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 9.7 feet on 05/28/2016. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Many flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Friday afternoon at 400 PM CDT.
